Navigation.getStartedLinkMessage: Hello, I would like to know more about your services

Hero.title: Transforming <highlight>Visions</highlight> into Digital Reality
Hero.description: Custom software development to propel your business forward. We build scalable, innovative solutions that drive real results.

About.subtitle: About T-YOU
About.title: Building the Future, One Line of Code at a Time
About.description1: T-YOU is a technology solutions company dedicated to transforming businesses through innovative software development. We combine technical expertise with strategic thinking to deliver solutions that drive real business value.
About.description2: Our team of experienced developers, designers, and strategists work collaboratively to understand your unique challenges and create custom solutions that exceed expectations.

Services.subtitle: What We Do
Services.title: Comprehensive Technology Services
Services.description: From concept to deployment, we provide end-to-end software development services that transform your ideas into powerful digital solutions.

customDev.title: Custom Software Development
customDev.description: Tailored solutions built from the ground up to meet your unique business requirements and scale with your growth.

mobileApps.title: Mobile Applications
mobileApps.description: Native and cross-platform mobile apps that deliver exceptional user experiences on iOS and Android.

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: Scalable cloud infrastructure and migration services to optimize performance and reduce operational costs.

security.title: Cybersecurity
security.description: Comprehensive security audits and implementation to protect your digital assets and customer data.

api.title: API Development
api.description: Robust and well-documented APIs that enable seamless integration and data exchange between systems.

consulting.title: Consulting & Strategy
consulting.description: Expert guidance on technology decisions, architecture design, and digital transformation initiatives.

brasoul.description: An institutional web platform for a natural cosmetics brand inspired by Amazonian biodiversity. The site features dynamic product showcases for its hair care lines (Radiant, Sublime) and integrates real-time inventory management. It highlights the brand's commitment to sustainability and includes an analytics dashboard to track customer engagement.

ra.description: A comprehensive web platform for an established automotive dealer with 29 years of market experience. The application showcases a curated inventory of new and high-quality used vehicles, integrated with a real-time stock management system. Key features include detailed financing options and a customer testimonial section to build trust and emphasize quality service.

triorb.description: A scalable web platform specializing in high-realism technological visualization for construction and real estate projects. The application delivers immersive AR/VR experiences, including interactive 360° virtual tours and 3D humanized floor plans. It serves as a dynamic portfolio for projects like Residencial Renascence and Terras de Santo Antônio, with a backend to gather insights on user engagement.

zcom.description: A scalable platform for a Brazilian ISP specializing in 100% fiber optic internet and TV services. The application features a robust customer portal for managing subscriptions and accessing support. It also integrates tools for real-time network monitoring and provides an analytics dashboard to track service performance and reliability.

Contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
Contact.title: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
Contact.description: Ready to transform your vision into reality? Contact us today to discuss your project and discover how we can help your business thrive.

Footer.description: Transforming visions into digital reality through innovative software development.

Hero.title:

Hero.description: Your AI receptionist works 24/7 to capture leads, qualify prospects, and schedule property visits automatically.
Hero.ctaStartLinkMessage: I would like to know more about T_Imob

Problem.title: The Problem
Problem.description: Real estate agencies lose countless opportunities due to limited availability and manual processes.

items.waste: Agents waste time on repetitive tasks

Solution.title: AI-Powered Voice Assistant
Solution.description1: T_Imob is a SaaS solution that acts as a virtual "super receptionist" for real estate agencies, operating 24/7 through advanced Voice AI technology.
Solution.description2: Our system seamlessly integrates with your existing CRM and calendar systems to automate lead capture, qualification, and visit scheduling—all while providing a human-like conversation experience.

Features.title: Powerful Features
Features.description: Everything you need to transform your real estate agency operations.

capture.title: 24/7 Lead Capture
capture.description: Never miss a call. Our AI answers every inquiry, day or night.

conversations.title: Natural Conversations
conversations.description: Human-like interactions that build trust with potential clients.

scheduling.title: Automatic Scheduling
scheduling.description: Schedule property visits directly in your calendar system.

qualification.title: Lead Qualification
qualification.description: Intelligent filtering to prioritize high-value opportunities.

crm.title: CRM Integration
crm.description: Seamlessly sync with your existing real estate tools.

time.title: Time Savings
time.description: Free up agents to focus on closing deals, not admin tasks.

KPIs.title: Results That Matter
KPIs.description: Measurable impact on your real estate business performance.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.description: Seamless automation from first call to scheduled visit.

1.title: Lead Calls In
1.description: Potential client calls your agency number

2.title: AI Answers
2.description: T_Imob picks up and engages in natural conversation

3.title: Qualification
3.description: AI assesses needs and property requirements

4.title: Schedule Visit
4.description: Books appointment directly in your calendar

5.title: CRM Update
5.description: All data automatically synced to your systems

CTA.title: Ready to Transform Your Agency?
CTA.description: Join forward-thinking real estate agencies already using AI to capture more leads and close more deals.
